title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.26 - Berth usage; speed restrictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.26 - Berth usage; speed restrictions

State Regulations

No watercraft shall be operated at a speed or in a manner
which endangers unreasonably or is likely to endanger unreasonably persons or
property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
